name: Henry Company 810-14 Heavy Duty Asphalt Roof Coating
description: 810-14 Heavy Duty Asphalt Roof Coating is a solvent type, heavy-duty asphalt cutback roof coating composed of a blend of special asphalts compounded with selected fibers and fillers. Designed to provide superior weathering characteristics. Flexibility, bonding properties and chemical resistance are excellent.is a solvent type, heavy-duty asphalt cutback roof coating composed of a blend of special asphalts compounded with selected fibers and fillers. Designed to provide superior weathering characteristics. Flexibility, bonding properties and chemical resistance are excellent.
